notification.title: My Helsinki Places
notification.mandatory: Mandatory information is marked with an asterisk *

validationFailed.title: Validation failed
validationFailed.message: Check that the information is correct

comments.title: Comments
comments.notice: Check the information and send the form. If you want, you can add comments for the moderator of the information.

comments.label: Comments to the moderator of the information

shortDescription.label: Place's short description in
shortDescription.helperText: Note that the text cannot be in 'we' form. Length max. 150 characters
shortDescription.tooltipText: A short description helps the place to be found more easily with a search engine.

longDescription.label: Place's long description in
longDescription.helperText: Note that the text cannot be in 'we' form. Length 120 - 4000 characters

inputLanguage.title: Give the information in the languages

map.title: Map of place
map.notice: The place is shown on the map based on the address given above. If the search result is imprecise or incorrect, you can correct it by moving the marker on the map to the right place. We recommend that the marker is located at the main entrance to the place.

notifier.title: Notifier's information
notifier.owner: I am the place's representative or owner

opening.title: Opening times
opening.notice: Opening times are notified in the final stage.

photos.title: Photos
photos.notice: Add a url-address for a photo located on the internet. For the time being photos cannot be uploaded from a device, so only links to photos are possible. Adding a photo is not required. In case a photo is added, its mandatory information is marked with an asterisk *

placeType.title: Place's type
placeType.myPlace: The place I'm notifying about is a

add.label: Add keyword
add.helperText: Type a search word or select from the list.
